title: Shillelagh
content:
o Duration: 10 turns

How to Acquire Shillelagh

Shillelagh can be acquired by the following classes and feat: Druid, Nature Domain Magic Initiate: Druid

Druid, Nature Domain Magic Initiate: Druid

How to Use Shillelagh in Baldur's Gate 3

Shillelagh offers powerful offensive utility for the Druid, for players who prefer being melee fighters or combining melee combat with their ranged Spells. Using Shillelagh enchants whatever Weapon the Druid has equipped so that its damage stats get replaced
